name: Crypt - Epic Games Megajam 2022
description:
Team Name: ANKGames

Objective

Avoid the skeletons by using rocks to distract them and collect skulls before the timer runs out! Each skull gives 10 points.

Controls:

WASD/Left Joystick to move

Space/Gamepad Bottom Face Button to jump

Left Shift/Gamepad Right Shoulder to sprint

G/Gamepad Right Trigger to throw a rock

Left Ctrl/Gamepad Face Button right to crouch

F/Gamepad Face Button Left to toggle flashlight

Platform: Windows
Engine Version: 5.0.3
